headline: Zebra Technologies to Buy Photoneo & Boost Product Portfolio
summary: ZBRA's acquisition of Photoneo is set to enable it to strengthen its product offerings and boost its position in the 3D machine vision solutions industry.

raw.headline: Zebra Technologies to Buy Photoneo & Boost Product Portfolio
raw.summary: ZBRA's acquisition of Photoneo is set to enable it to strengthen its product offerings and boost its position in the 3D machine vision solutions industry.

headline: Zebra to acquire 3D machine firm Photoneo with ‘cash on hand’ in accretive deal
summary: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) announced it intends to acquire Photoneo, a developer and manufacturer of 3D machine vision solutions. The 3D segment of the Machine Vision market is the fastest growing, and this acquisition will further accelerate Zebra’s presence in the category…”This acquisition addresses the needs of customers globally who want to maximize the potential of machine vision within their frontline operations,” said Bill Burns, Chief Executive Officer, Zebra Technologies. “Building on Z
